cps.server.controllers

Class OnetimeParkingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cps.server.controllers.RequestController
      • cps.server.controllers.OnetimeParkingController

  • public class OnetimeParkingController
extends RequestController
    Handles requests that deal with One-time Parking Services: - Incidental Parking (Park now) - Reserved Parking (Order now and park later)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OnetimeParkingController(ServerController serverController)
      Instantiates a new onetime parking controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerResponse handle(CancelOnetimeParkingRequest request, UserSession session)
      Called when the user wants to cancel a parking reservation that they made with a ReservedParkingRequest.
      ServerResponse handle(IncidentalParkingRequest request, CustomerSession session)
      Called when the user wants to Park Now (Incidental Parking request).
      ServerResponse handle(ListOnetimeEntriesRequest request, UserSession session)
      Returns a list of all one-time parking services that this customer had ordered.
      ServerResponse handle(ReservedParkingRequest request, CustomerSession session)
      Called when the user wants to make a Reserved Parking request.

        getDatabaseController, getServerController

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public ServerResponse handle(CancelOnetimeParkingRequest request,
                             UserSession session)
        Called when the user wants to cancel a parking reservation that they made with a ReservedParkingRequest.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        session - the session
        Returns:
        the server response

      • handle

        public ServerResponse handle(IncidentalParkingRequest request,
                             CustomerSession session)
        Called when the user wants to Park Now (Incidental Parking request). Calls the generalized handler with the appropriate parameters for an Incidental Parking request. If the user made an IncidentalParking request, their car will be parked immediately after that.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        session - the session
        Returns:
        the server response

      • handle

        public ServerResponse handle(ListOnetimeEntriesRequest request,
                             UserSession session)
        Returns a list of all one-time parking services that this customer had ordered.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        session - the session
        Returns:
        the server response

      • handle

        public ServerResponse handle(ReservedParkingRequest request,
                             CustomerSession session)
        Called when the user wants to make a Reserved Parking request. Calls the generalized handler with the appropriate parameters for a Reserved Parking request.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        session - the session
        Returns:
        the server response
